features.title: Material
features.details: Typically made from stainless steel or BPA-free plastic, ensuring durability and safety for hot or cold beverages.

features.title: Capacity
features.details: Ranges from 500ml to 1 liter, ideal for daily hydration needs during travel, work, or exercise.

features.title: Insulation
features.details: Often double-walled with vacuum insulation, keeping drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: World Atlas
description: A beautifully illustrated world atlas with detailed maps and geographical information.

features.title: Comprehensive Maps
features.details: Features detailed political, physical, and thematic maps of the world, updated with the latest geographic and political data.

features.title: Educational Content
features.details: Includes facts on countries, climates, and ecosystems, with high-quality visuals and charts for students and enthusiasts.

features.title: Durable Format
features.details: Available in hardcover or paperback, typically 300+ pages, with a large format (e.g., 10 x 13 inches) for easy reading.

name: Running Shoes
description: Experience superior comfort and performance with these limited edition running shoes, engineered for all terrains.

features.title: Cushioning Technology
features.details: Features Zoom Air or React foam for responsive cushioning, providing comfort and energy return for long-distance running or sprints.

features.title: Breathable Upper
features.details: Constructed with Flyknit or mesh uppers for enhanced airflow, reducing sweat and keeping feet cool during intense runs.

features.title: Traction and Durability
features.details: Equipped with a durable rubber outsole with waffle or lug patterns for superior grip on roads, tracks, or light trails.

name: Yoga Mat
description: A top-rated yoga mat providing excellent grip and cushioning for all your fitness routines.

features.title: Material and Grip
features.details: Made from eco-friendly PVC (e.g., PRO series) or natural rubber, offering superior grip even when wet, ideal for hot yoga or intense sessions.

features.title: Thickness and Comfort
features.details: Available in 5–6mm thickness for cushioning joints, with a dense structure to support balance during poses.

features.title: Durability
features.details: Features a closed-cell surface to prevent sweat absorption and a lifetime guarantee on select models like the PRO, ensuring long-term use.

name: Camping Lantern
description: An affordable and reliable camping lantern providing bright and long-lasting illumination.

features.title: Brightness
features.details: Provides up to 250–400 lumens (e.g., Black Diamond Moji), with adjustable settings for dimming or strobe modes, illuminating campsites effectively.

features.title: Portability
features.details: Lightweight (3–5 oz) with a collapsible hook or base for hanging or standing, powered by AAA batteries or USB-rechargeable options.

features.title: Durability
features.details: IPX4 water-resistant rating ensures functionality in rain, with a frosted globe for even light distribution.

name: Portable Camping Chair
description: An ultra-lightweight and compact portable camping chair made with eco-friendly materials.

features.title: Lightweight Design
features.details: Weighs 1–2 pounds (e.g., Helinox Chair One), with a collapsible aluminum frame for easy transport in a carry bag.

features.title: Comfort and Support
features.details: Supports up to 320 pounds with a breathable polyester seat, offering ergonomic seating for extended campsite relaxation.

features.title: Durability
features.details: Features DAC aluminum poles and ripstop fabric, with weather-resistant construction for use in various outdoor conditions.

name: Board Game: Catan
description: A top-rated strategy board game where players collect resources and build settlements.

features.title: Gameplay
features.details: A strategy game for 3–4 players (ages 10+), involving resource management (wood, wheat, ore, etc.) to build settlements, roads, and cities, with games lasting 60–90 minutes.

features.title: Replayability
features.details: Features a modular board with variable setups, ensuring unique gameplay each time, with expansions available for added complexity.

features.title: Educational Benefits
features.details: Promotes critical thinking, negotiation, and planning skills, making it a favorite for family game nights and educational settings.
